# Sell Singles

> Compare prices on individual Pokemon & Sports cards across every marketplace

Sell Singles is a price comparison engine for individual trading cards. Search any card and instantly see prices from eBay, TCGPlayer, COMC, Mercari, Amazon, and StockX side by side.

## Features
- Real-time price comparison across 6+ marketplaces
- Price history charts and trend analysis
- Price drop alerts and notifications
- Graded card filtering (PSA, BGS, CGC)
- Mobile-first design for use at card shows
- Savings tracker

## Card Categories
- Pokemon TCG
- Sports Cards (Baseball, Basketball, Football, Hockey)
- Yu-Gi-Oh!
- Magic: The Gathering
- Other Trading Card Games

## Status
Currently in waitlist phase. Join at https://sell.singles

## Links
- Website: https://sell.singles
- Live Marketplace: https://sell.party
- Profit Tracker: https://flip.ink
